implementation.functions: -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Deus Ex Machina (II) -- https://github.com/toggledbits/DeusExMachina -- Original code and releases 1.x by Andy Lintner (beowulfe) Version 2.0 and beyond by Patrick Rigney (rigpapa/toggledbits). -- A big thanks to Andy for passing the torch so that this great plug-in can live on. -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- function startupDeusExMachinaII1() luup.log("DeusExMachinaII STARTUP!") demII = require("L_DeusExMachinaII1") deusStep = demII.deusStep demII.deusInit() end

action.name: SetTarget
action.job: local newTargetValue = lul_settings.newTargetValue or "0" luup.variable_set("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "Target", newTargetValue, lul_device) if (newTargetValue == "1") then demII.deusEnable() else demII.deusDisable() end

action.name: SetEnabled
action.job: local newEnabledValue = lul_settings.NewEnabledValue or "0" luup.variable_set("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "Target", newEnabledValue, lul_device) if (newEnabledValue == "1") then demII.deusEnable() else demII.deusDisable() end
